rules_text:
Mutate {B}{B}{G}{G}
Menace
When Soul-Sear Seer enters or mutates, exile up to two cards from your graveyard. You may play those cards this turn. At the end of turn, if you didn't play the exiled cards, each opponent loses 1 life for each card not played this way.
–
rules_text2:
Delve [i](Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)[/i]
Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of those cards into your hand, and put two of them into your graveyard. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
